section.p: You have only one choice - to lead your men in a concerted attack up the beach, and try to defeat the wreckers in battle. Otherwise you will be picked off one by one. As for the ship - you can see that it will be lost. With a vengeful battle cry, you try to rally your crew.
‘Up and at ‘em, lads!’ you shout, and, waist deep in the water, you charge at the beach.
. Add 1 to your roll if you are a Warrior, and one if you are 4th Rank or higher. Subtract one if you have a poor crew, and add one if you have a good or an excellent crew.
